sentences.sContent: I saw that my garland of overnight was still hanging loose from your hair.
sentences.sContent_eng: I saw that my garland of overnight was still hanging loose from your hair.
sentences.sCn: 我看见，昨夜我为你编结的花环依然松松地垂在你的发上。

sentences.sContent: A simple yellow garment and a garland of wild-flowers are all the ornaments they require.
sentences.sContent_eng: A simple yellow garment and a garland of wild-flowers are all the ornaments they require.
sentences.sCn: 一件朴素的黄衫，一个野花扎成的花环，就是他们所需要的全部装饰。

sentences.sContent: In the others a series of dramatic situations were strung on a thread of melody; this was a garland of songs with just a thread of dramatic plot running through.
sentences.sContent_eng: In the others a series of dramatic situations were strung on a thread of melody; this was a garland of songs with just a thread of dramatic plot running through.
sentences.sCn: 在头两个里，一系列戏剧性的场景，是串在一根歌曲的线上；而在这一个里，一花环的歌曲，只用一个戏剧情节的线头贯穿。

trans.tranOther: a ring of flowers or leaves, worn on your head or around your neck for decoration or for a special ceremony
